Title: CAD Design
Content: A lot of my projects require 3D printing, which requires CAD design. I have a little experience in Fusion360 but I switched to Onshape recently.

Title: 3D Printing
Content: I'm sort of a novice when it comes to the settings you can mess with, but I do have experience maintaining and repairing 3D printers.

Title: Programming
Content: A more obvious thing about me, I like to program and I have been programming since I was 10, starting with blocks of course.

Title: Robotics
Content: By robotics I mean using microcontrollers to control other devices, but I have made actual robots too.

Title: Soldering
Content: I have gotten pretty good at soldering from my robotics tinkering, and I can now make pretty neat joints.

Title: Project Tracking
Content: With all the projects I have made, I usually set up a Trello board to track my progress, and I have been able to make them highly organized over time.
